ca.nengo.util

Interface VectorGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedVectorGenerator, IndependentDimensionApproximator.EncoderFactory, IndependentDimensionApproximator.EvalPointFactory, RandomHypersphereVG, Rectifier

    public interface VectorGenerator
    A tool for generating sets of uniformly or randomly distributed vectors.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[][] genVectors(int number, int dimension)
      The vector distribution is decided by implementing classes.

    • Method Detail

      • genVectors

        float[][] genVectors(int number,
                   int dimension)
        The vector distribution is decided by implementing classes.
        Parameters:
        number - Number of vectors to be returned
        dimension - Dimension of the vectors to be returned
        Returns:
        A List of float[] vectors
